articles.content:
In the lead-up to the Dec. 18, 2026 release of Avengers: Doomsday, and to hype up the audiences and fans, Marvel Studios will re-release Avengers: Endgame.

articles.title: Playwright-Producer Jeremy O. Harris Jailed in Japan - Playbill
articles.description: The Slave Play writer was arrested last month after MDMA was found in his tote bag at Okinawa's Naha Airport.
